ygData.subject: crawling progress problem
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, Heritrix seems to get stuck on a site that I m crawling.  I let the crawl run overnight, and it eventually finished crawling 101 pages in just under 8

Hi all,
      Heritrix seems to get stuck on a site that I'm crawling.  I l=
et
the crawl run overnight, and it eventually finished crawling 101 pages
i=
n just under 8 hours.  Below is a portion of the crawl
log that has me scra=
tching my head.  You'll notice that there's an
approx. 40 min. delay betwee=
n the entries at 4:19 and 5:03.  Then
there's a several hour delay between =
the entries 5:04 and 10:26, and
also between 10:26 and 12:13.  I'm using He=
ritrix 1.10.1 out of the
box with the default profile to crawl this site.  =
I've tried adjusting
"retry-delay-seconds" in BdbFrontier, as well as "time=
out-seconds" in
FetchHTTP without any luck.  Anybody have any ideas on how =
to prevent
these long delays in the crawl?  Thanks much!
